name: Scribble Worm
summary:
Draw worms with your fingers and watch them come to life in this new puzzle game! Avoid the red walls, bounce off the blue walls, slide on the gray walls. Watch out: some walls move! Pattern anticipation and timing are a must in this challenging and addictive puzzle game.
Challenge your friends in the 2-player head-to-head mode. Race your worms to reach the apple first, and collect the GameCenter achievements.
